exercises.name: Chest Press Machine
instructions: Setup: Adjust seat height so handles align with mid-chest level
Execution: Push handles forward in controlled motion, squeeze chest at top
Form cue: Keep shoulder blades pressed against pad, avoid locking elbows

exercises.name: Cable Lat Pulldown
instructions: Setup: Adjust thigh pad and select wide grip bar at comfortable width
Execution: Pull bar down to upper chest, squeeze shoulder blades together
Form cue: Lean back slightly, avoid using momentum or swinging

exercises.name: Cable Lateral Raises
instructions: Setup: Set cables to lowest position, grab handles with arms at sides
Execution: Raise arms out to sides until parallel with floor
Form cue: Keep slight bend in elbows, lead with pinkies, control the negative

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row
instructions: Setup: Sit with chest up, grab handle with both hands, slight bend in knees
Execution: Pull handle to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades together
Form cue: Keep torso upright, avoid using lower back to pull

exercises.name: Cable Tricep Pushdowns
instructions: Setup: Stand facing cable machine with straight bar attached high
Execution: Push bar down until arms are straight, squeeze triceps
Form cue: Keep elbows tucked at sides, only forearms should move

exercises.name: Leg Press Machine
instructions: Setup: Sit in machine with feet shoulder-width apart on platform
Execution: Lower weight until knees reach 90 degrees, press through heels
Form cue: Keep knees aligned with toes, maintain contact with back pad

exercises.name: Seated Leg Curl
instructions: Setup: Adjust back pad and leg pad to fit comfortably behind calves
Execution: Curl heels toward glutes, squeeze hamstrings at top
Form cue: Keep hips pressed into seat, control the weight on return

exercises.name: Leg Extension Machine
instructions: Setup: Adjust back pad and position leg pad above ankles
Execution: Extend legs until straight, squeeze quadriceps at top
Form cue: Keep back against pad, avoid locking knees aggressively

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raise Machine
instructions: Setup: Position shoulders under pads, balls of feet on platform
Execution: Rise up on toes as high as possible, squeeze calves
Form cue: Keep legs straight, get full range of motion, pause at top

exercises.name: Cable Glute Kickbacks
instructions: Setup: Attach ankle strap to low cable, face machine holding handles
Execution: Kick leg straight back, squeeze glute at top position
Form cue: Keep hips square, avoid arching lower back, control the return

exercises.name: Recumbent Bike
instructions: Setup: Adjust seat so legs have slight bend at full extension
Execution: Maintain steady pace at 65-75% perceived effort with 2-minute intervals at higher intensity every 5 minutes

exercises.name: Dynamic Warm-up Stretches
instructions: Step 1: Arm circles forward and backward 10 each direction
Step 2: Leg swings front to back and side to side 10 each leg
Step 3: Hip circles and ankle rolls 10 each direction

exercises.name: Static Stretching Routine
instructions: Step 1: Hold each stretch for 30-45 seconds without bouncing
Step 2: Focus on chest, shoulders, hip flexors, hamstrings, and calves
Step 3: Include spinal twists and cat-cow stretches for back mobility

exercises.name: Foam Rolling
instructions: Step 1: Roll each muscle group slowly for 60-90 seconds
Step 2: Focus on IT bands, quads, hamstrings, and upper back
Step 3: Apply moderate pressure and pause on tender spots

Essentials: Optimizing Workspace for Productivity, Focus & Creativity
Best Ways to Build Better Habits & Break Bad Ones | James Clear
